events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but it does not fit me at all. I would like to know the process to return it and get a refund.
The case has been identified as a refund request based on the customer's issue of returning an item.
Support agent Emily has been assigned to handle the refund request and assist the customer further.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I’m happy to assist you with the return and refund process for your jacket.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm whether the jacket has been worn or damaged?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I have not worn the jacket, it’s brand new and still has tags attached.
Thank you for the details. You can return the jacket using our prepaid shipping label, and we will process your refund within 5 business days after receiving the item.
That sounds great, thank you for the quick response and clear instructions. I will initiate the return as soon as possible.
The return instructions and refund policy have been provided, and the case is being marked as resolved from our side.
We are following up to ensure you received your refund after returning the jacket. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist you with.
